keyword: how many calories in a marshmallow
title: How Many Calories in a Marshmallow?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a marshmallow, including carbs, sugars, full nutrition breakdown per unit, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Marshmallow?
assumptions: Standard large marshmallow (~10 g), plain, not toasted; values based on common commercial brands like Jet-Puffed.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, flavor, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard large marshmallow contains about 22 kcal, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a large marshmallow?
faqs.a: Approximately 22 kcal for one standard large marshmallow.
Yes, about 4.4 g of sugars per large marshmallow, with 5.6 g total carbs.

faqs.q: Do marshmallows have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Very littleâ€”0.1 g protein and 0 g fat per marshmallow.

faqs.q: How do mini marshmallows compare in calories?
faqs.a: A mini is about 11 kcal, half of a large one.

faqs.q: Does toasting a marshmallow add calories?
faqs.a: No significant change; it's mostly moisture loss with negligible calorie impact.
